item.title: Ebola Outbreak in DRC 2018
item.description: An outbreak of Ebola occurred in the Equator province of the Democratic Republic of Congo in April 2018. The WHO published its first Disease Outbreak News on the outbreak on May 10th and began efforts to conduct ring vaccination around the area. You can read more about it on the WHOâ€™s website on the 2018 Ebola outbreak in the DRC.
